p: Furthermore, synergistic or antagonistic effects could occur among the components, and such interactions may positively or negatively affect the ultimate antioxidant properties of EOs. For the aforementioned reasons, more in-depth knowledge of the mechanism of action and effects of individual compounds would allow the formulation of mixtures of compounds with optimized efficacy. Moreover, the vast amount of information being generated by in vitro assays requires further validation through systematic animal studies and clinical investigation.
